snippet: The university fired Coach Bobby Petrino in the wake of an embarrassing scandal that began with Petrino getting in a motorcycle accident last week.
abstract: Arkansas fires football coach Bobby Petrino in wake of embarrassing scandal that began with Petrino getting in motorcycle accident that exposed his affair with a young staffer.
lead_paragraph: The university fired Coach Bobby Petrino in the wake of an embarrassing scandal that began with Petrino getting in a motorcycle accident last week.

headline.main: Arkansas Fires Petrino, Citing ‘Misleading and Manipulative Behavior’
